name: Falcon Ultralight Backpackin' Tips
description: Loaded with 153 trail-tested tips for backpackers serious about travelling ultralight. Learn what makes up a comprehensive gear list, and discover how to make your own inexpensive, lightweight gear. This guide covers systems for packing, shelter, sleeping, and cooking. There’s also information about food and water considerations, travel techniques, and the ultralight mind-set. Step number 1: Get a scale.
